lead_paragraph: Darius McCollum, who has a lengthy record of arrests for stealing trains and impersonating transit workers, has been arrested again.
snippet: Darius McCollum, who has a lengthy record of arrests for stealing trains and impersonating transit workers, has been arrested again.

headline.main: Subway Thief Now Accused of Stealing a Trailways Bus
headline.seo: Subway-Driving Imposter Accused of Stealing a Bus
headline.print_headline: Subway Thief Now Accused of Stealing a Trailways Bus

byline.contributor: Shane Dixon Kavanaugh and Nate Schweber contributed reporting.
